content.text: Hello, I'm a bit of an introvert. How are you today?
I'm doing well! I'm an extrovert, so I love meeting new people.
I like to bake, but I'm not very good at it. What are your hobbies?
I like to hike and spend time with my family.
My family is very close and we always have each other's backs.
That's great! My family is also very supportive of me, even though I want to be an actor.
I'm saving up to get some procedures done. What are you saving up for?
I'm not sure yet. I might buy a new car or a house.
I would like to be reincarnated as a dog so I can continue to be with my family.
That's a great idea! I'd love to be a dog too.
